# thunder_network_lacp (Resource)

`thunder_network_lacp`: LACP commands

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_network_lacp" "thunder_network_lacp" {
  system_priority = 32762
}
```
